name: Name
commentMinLength: Comment must have at least 2 characters.
noPendingGames: No pending games in your library.
manualinicioTexto:
This is the first screen you will see when entering the app. From here you get an overview of recent activity, popular games and quick access to the main sections.

The top left has a button that opens the side menu. That menu is the main way to navigate. On mobile you will also see floating buttons to open the search.
manualjuegosTexto:
Here you can explore the entire game catalog. Use the search bar at the top to find any title. You can filter by genre, platform or sort alphabetically, by popularity or release date.

Click a game card to view details like synopsis, cover, platforms, ratings, videos and store offers from price aggregators.
manualbibliotecaTexto:
This section groups all games you've added to your personal collection. Add a game from its detail page using the 'Add to my library' button.

The library helps organize and review your games, track play time, favorites and pending titles. From each card you can start a session or view stats. You can also sort alphabetically, by play time, acquisition date or preferences.
manualdiarioTexto:
The game diary lets you manually log play sessions. For each day you play you can create an entry indicating the game, time played and a note.

You can mark if you finished or abandoned a game. Entries appear on an interactive calendar so you can see progress easily.
manualplanificacionesTexto:
Use this section to schedule future play sessions like an agenda. Helpful for organizing limited time.

Create events such as 'play the final chapter of X on Saturday night' or 'start Y next week'. These events can include multiple games and tasks, and you can mark completed items. The app will notify you near the date if reminders are active.
manualperfilTexto:
Your profile contains all user data. Change your name, avatar, write a short bio or add favorite games.

You can also see overall stats like number of games, hours played, ratings and diary entries. Other users can visit your profile and see public info like shared games or comments you've posted.
manualajustesTexto:
The settings section lets you customize how the app works and looks. Options include:

- Change the interface language.
- Select a visual theme (light, dark or custom).
- Enable or disable sounds, notifications and effects.
- Configure privacy or restore defaults.

Check this section the first time you log in to ensure the app fits your preferences.
manualjugarTexto:
This section helps you accurately track time spent playing. Search for the game and press 'Start play session'. The app will start counting automatically.

When finished, return here and press 'Stop session'. The time will be saved and shown in your library and diary. No manual notes needed and you can track when and how long you played. Useful to detect habits, organize sessions and have real statistics.
